Docs.summary: An interface representing a SPARQL endpoint.
Docs.remarks: This interface is implemented by classes that support methods for accessing a SPARQL endpoint.

MemberSignature.Value: public void RunSparqlQuery (string sparqlQuery, SemWeb.Query.QueryResultSink selectResults);

Docs.param: A QueryResultSink into which the resulting variable bindings are streamed.
Docs.summary: Runs a SPARQL SELECT query and returns the results into a QueryResultSink.
Docs.remarks: Any exception may be thrown by this method depending on the implementation.

MemberSignature.Value: public void RunSparqlQuery (string sparqlQuery, SemWeb.StatementSink statementResults);

Docs.param: A StatementSink into which the statements that result from the query are streamed.
Docs.summary: Runs a SPARQL CONSTRUCT or DESCRIBE query and returns the resulting statements into a StatementSink.
Docs.remarks: Any exception may be thrown by this method depending on the implementation.

MemberSignature.Value: public void RunSparqlQuery (string sparqlQuery, out bool askResult);

Docs.param: The result of the query is set into this parameter on completion of the method.
Docs.summary: Runs a SPARQL ASK query and returns the boolean result.
Docs.remarks: Any exception may be thrown by this method depending on the implementation.

MemberSignature.Value: public void RunSparqlQuery (string sparqlQuery, System.IO.TextWriter output);

Docs.param: A TextWriter to which the result of the query is written.
Docs.summary: Runs a SPARQL query of any type and sends the output into a TextWriter.
Docs.remarks: Any exception may be thrown by this method depending on the implementation.
